title: Microsoft Detects Growing Use of File Hosting Services in Business Email Compromise Attacks
description: Microsoft is warning of cyber attack campaigns that abuse legitimate file hosting services such as SharePoint, OneDrive, and Dropbox that are widely used in enterprise environments as a defense evasion tactic.
